headline: Why Investors Were Slamming the Phone Down on T-Mobile US Stock Today
summary: Remarks uttered by the CEO of T-Mobile US (NASDAQ: TMUS) on Monday weren't exactly well received by investors.  Speaking at the UBS Global Media and Telecommunications conference Monday, T-Mobile US Chief Mike Sievert essentially said his company's investors should prepare for some discouraging news coming down the pike.  Much of this has to do with an anticipated slowdown in customer additions, which Sievert described as notching a "decade-long record" in said quarter.
